import { useState } from "react" import { BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route,Link } from "react-router-dom" function Login() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: '', password: '' }) function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() fetch('http://localhost:3006/login', { method: 'POST', headers: {'Content-Type' : 'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify(formData) }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => console.log(data.user)) } function handleChange(e) { setFormData({...formData, [e.target.name] : e.target.value}) } return (

Login

handleChange(e)}className="form-control" id="inputPassword3"/>

) } export default Login
